User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Aura application.

arePlaylistsPublic.description: Determines if the user's playlists are visible to others.

songCount.description: The number of songs in the playlist.

Song.title: Song
Song.description: Represents a song in the user's music library.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single chat message for a specific song.

Follow.title: Follow
Follow.description: Represents a follow relationship between two users.

uid.description: The UID of the user who is following or being followed.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a private chat session between users. IMPORTANT: This collection should only be queryable with a 'where' clause on 'participantIds' using 'array-contains'. Listing the entire collection is a security risk and should be disallowed.

participantIds.description: An array containing the UIDs of all participants in the chat.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Any authenticated user can read (get) a profile, but only the owner can write (create, update, delete).

/users/{userId}/playlists/{playlistId}.description: Stores user-created playlists. Any authenticated user can read (get, list) playlists, but only the owner can write.

/users/{userId}/playlists/{playlistId}/s.description: Sub-collection for songs in a playlist. Only the owner can read and write.

/songs/{songId}.description: Global song catalog. All authenticated users can read and write.

/songs/{songId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Chat messages for a specific song. All authenticated users can read and write.

/users/{userId}/followers/{followerId}.description: List of users following {userId}. Any authenticated user can read this list. Writing is managed by social logic (following/unfollowing).

/users/{userId}/following/{followingId}.description: List of users that {userId} is following. Any authenticated user can read this list, but only the owner can write.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Private chat rooms. Reading a single document and all writes are restricted to participants. Listing is only allowed with a query filtering by the current user's ID in 'participantIds'.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Messages for a private chat. All operations are restricted to participants of the parent chat.
